title: Dragonfly Capital, Galaxy Ventures and NFX share insights on crypto scaling and strategy at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
content:

title: Announcing the final agenda for the Builders Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
content:
Get ready for TechCrunch Disrupt 2024, our signature event for startups of all stages, happening at Moscone West in San Francisco from October 28-30. This year, we’re expecting a massive turnout of 10,000 leaders from the startup and VC community. As part of the program, we’re thrilled to unveil the complete agenda for the Builders Stage. […]

title: Spotter launches AI tools to help YouTubers brainstorm video ideas, thumbnails and more
content:
Spotter, the startup that provides financial solutions to content creators, announced Tuesday the launch of its new AI-powered creative suite. Dubbed Spotter Studio, the solution aims to support YouTubers throughout the creative process, such as helping them brainstorm video concepts, generate thumbnail and title ideas, plan projects, organize tasks, and collaborate with their team. Most notably, […]

title: Elon Musk’s Brazil battle wages on
content:

title: Xavier Niel replaces Coatue’s Laffont on board of TikTok parent ByteDance
content:
French billionaire Xavier Niel is joining the board of directors of TikTok’s parent, ByteDance, the company told the South China Morning Post. It’s an interesting move as Niel isn’t a name that comes up very often for high-profile board positions. He is replacing Philippe Laffont, the founder of the New York-based investment firm Coatue Management, […]

title: X now lets you edit DMs — here is how to use the feature

title: ‘Hospital at home’ startup Doccla raises $46 million for its European expansion
content:

title: Accel, Docker and Redis will discuss what’s next in open source as a business model at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
content:
